content.raw:
In `INTEGRATION_camera_sensor_igntransport`, the `WorldReset` test has been failing since pull request #2781 was merged:

* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-default-homebrew-amd64/268/
* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-default-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia/83

Here's an example of the console output:

~~~
497: [ RUN      ] CameraSensorIgnTransport.WorldReset
497: [Msg] Waiting for master.
497: [Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
497: [Msg] Publicized address: 172.17.0.4
497: [Dbg] [ServerFixture.cc:209] ServerFixture load in 0.8 seconds, timeout after 600 seconds
497: /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-ci-default-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia/gazebo/test/integration/camera_sensor_igntransport.cc:102: Failure
497: Expected: (imageCount) >= (kTotalImages), actual: 0 vs 20
497: /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/gazebo-ci-default-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia/gazebo/test/integration/camera_sensor_igntransport.cc:104: Failure
497: Expected: (dt.Double()) < (3.0), actual: 4.00951 vs 3
497: [Dbg] [ServerFixture.cc:135] ServerFixture::Unload
497: [  FAILED  ] CameraSensorIgnTransport.WorldReset (5069 ms)
~~~

* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-default-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia/85/consoleFull
* https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-default-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia/85/testReport/junit/(root)/CameraSensorIgnTransport/WorldReset/

In INTEGRATION_camera_sensor_igntransport, the WorldReset test has been failing since pull request #2781 was merged:

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-default-homebrew-amd64/268/
  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-default-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia/83

Here's an example of the console output:

497: [ RUN      ] CameraSensorIgnTransport.WorldReset
497: [Msg] Waiting for master.
497: [Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
497: [Msg] Publicized address: 172.17.0.4
